mapper.insert: insert into carbrand (brandid, storeid, brandstore, brandname, brandengname, brandremark, brandstatus) values (#{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandstore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandengname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update carbrand set storeid = #{storeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brandstore = #{brandstore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brandname = #{brandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brandengname = #{brandengname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brandremark = #{brandremark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brandstatus = #{brandstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where brandid = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select brandid, storeid, brandstore, brandname, brandengname, brandremark, brandstatus from carbrand
